title: Practice POW and Asymmetric Encryption
description: Write a program to obtain a random number that satisfies a certain condition of the Hash value, and understand asymmetric encryption signature and verification.
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Practice POW, write a program (programming language is not limited) using your own nickname + nonce, continuously modify the nonce to perform sha256 Hash calculation:

1. Until a hash value starting with 4 zeros is satisfied, print the time spent, the content of the Hash, and the Hash value.
2. Recalculate until a hash value starting with 5 zeros is satisfied, print the time spent, the content of the Hash, and the Hash value.

Submit your program's Github link

Practice asymmetric encryption RSA (programming language is not limited):
1. First generate a pair of public and private keys
2. Use the private key to sign the "nickname + nonce" that meets the POW 4 zeros starting hash value
3. Verify with the public key


Submit your program's Github link
